decisions.description: Check if the Advisory Board checkbox is selected while the Contact has no Advisory Board Profile.
decisions.name: AB_Checked_No_AB_Profile
decisions.label: AB Checked & No AB Profile?

decisions.description: Checks if the updated email address is already associated with a Contact in SF.
decisions.name: Check_if_Contact_Exists_with_New_Email
decisions.label: Check if Contact Exists with New Email

decisions.description: Check if the contact's email address was updated.
decisions.name: Check_if_Email_has_Changed
decisions.label: Check if Email has Changed

rules.name: Sponsor_Reg_Type_with_No_Sponsor_Company
rules.label: Sponsor Reg Type with No Sponsor Company

rules.name: Paid_Reg_but_Reg_Billing_is_Blank
rules.label: Paid Reg but Reg Billing is Blank

decisions.description: Checks if the contact already has a registration for the selected event.
decisions.name: Does_registrant_have_a_Registration_for_Selected_Event
decisions.label: Does registrant have a Registration for Selected Event?

decisions.description: Checks if the Reg Billing Contract was filled in on the Registration screen.
decisions.name: Is_this_a_Paid_Registration
decisions.label: Is this a Paid Registration?

Flow.description: Creates a New Registration Button from an Action on a Contact Record that allows the user to: Update selected Contact's Fields, Create a Registration and Create a Registration Line Item if needed.

formulas.description: Gets the Salesforce Link to the Contact Record.
formulas.name: f_Link_to_Contact

Flow.label: Screen Flow: Update Contact & Create Registration

recordCreates.description: Creates a Registration Line Item associated with the Registration.
recordCreates.name: Create_Reg_Line_Item
recordCreates.label: Create Reg Line Item

recordLookups.name: Get_Contact_from_Screen_Email_Address
recordLookups.label: Get Contact from Screen Email Address

recordLookups.description: Gets the ID from the newly created Registration Record.
recordLookups.name: Get_New_Registration_Record
recordLookups.label: Get New Registration Record

recordLookups.description: Gets the contact's previous registration for this event, if it exists.
recordLookups.name: Get_Previous_Registration_Record
recordLookups.label: Get Previous Registration Record

fields.name: Screen_Oops_Reg_Billing_Blank
fields.fieldText:
Warning: Reg Billing Contract is not filled in.


Continue creating Paid Registration?

fields.name: Screen_Oops_Reg_Billing_Blank_0
fields.fieldText:
Warning: Non-Qual is not selected.


﻿Continue creating 'qualified' Sponsor Registration?

fields.name: Screen_Oops_Sponsor_Name_Blank
fields.fieldText:
Warning: Sponsor selected without a Sponsorship Name.


For events with sponsors, this will prevent a registration from being created. Continue?

fields.name: Could_Not_Create_Registration
fields.fieldText:
Error! Could not Create Registration.


﻿{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

screens.name: Error_Could_not_Create_Reg_Line_Item
screens.label: Error - Could not Create Reg Line Item

fields.name: Could_Not_Create_Registration_Line_Item
fields.fieldText:
Error! Could not Create Registration Line Item.


﻿{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: Error_Duplicate_Contact
fields.fieldText: Error! A Contact with the email address {!Screen_Email_Address.value} already exists: {!var_Get_Contact_Screen_Email_Name}

screens.name: Error_Screen_No_Advisory_Board_Profile
screens.label: Error Screen - No Advisory Board Profile

fields.name: Error_No_AB_Profile
fields.fieldText: Error! Advisory Board was selected, but {!Get_Contact_Record.Name} does not have an Advisory Board Profile.

validationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a maximum of 255 characters.

fields.name: Display_Text_No_Sponsors
fields.fieldText: There are no sponsorship contracts for the {!Get_Event_Record.Name}.

fields.name: Create_Reg_Line_Item_Screen
fields.fieldText: Create Registration Line Item

fields.name: Display_Oops_Registration_Exists
fields.fieldText: Oops! This contact already has a registration record for the {!Screen_Event_Name.recordName}: {!var_Registration_Number_Previous_Reg}

fields.name: Display_Review_or_Update_Contact_Record
fields.fieldText: Review & Update Contact Record

fields.name: Success_Message
fields.fieldText: Yay! You have successfully created a registration for {!Screen_First_Middle_Last.firstName} {!Screen_Last_Name}: {!varNewRegistration_RegNumber}

variables.description: The Event Name of the User-Selected event
